entry.title: ChainDB Whitepaper
entry.summary: BitPay has released its first whitepaper on ChainDB, a new peer-to-peer database system backed by the Bitcoin blockchain. The paper explains the intended consensus mechanism, proof of fee and requests feedback from users. The paper can be found on the link: https://bitpay.com/chaindb.pdf. Eric Martindale, BitPay's CTO invites any questions about the paper itself.
